item.title: Two Sum Iii Data Structure Design Design
item.description: Design and implement a TwoSum class. It should support the following operations: add and find. add - Add the number to an internal data structure. find - Find if there exists any pair of numbers which sum is equal to the value. Example 1: add(1); add(3); add(5); find(4) -> true find(7) -> false Example 2: add(3); add(1); add(2); find(3) -> true find(6) -> false Solution # Time: add is o(1), find is o(n) # Space: o(n) class TwoSum: def __init__(self): """ Initialize your data structure here.
